metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Average read latency in milliseconds per operation
metricSpecifications.name: AverageReadLatency

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Average write latency in milliseconds per operation
metricSpecifications.name: AverageWriteLatency

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Logical size of the volume (used bytes)
metricSpecifications.name: VolumeLogicalSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Size of all snapshots in volume
metricSpecifications.name: VolumeSnapshotSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Read In/out operations per second
metricSpecifications.name: ReadIops

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Write In/out operations per second
metricSpecifications.name: WriteIops

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The provisioned size of a volume
metricSpecifications.name: VolumeAllocatedSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Volume Footprint for Cool Tier
metricSpecifications.name: VolumeCoolTierSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Data read in using GET per volume
metricSpecifications.displayName: Volume cool tier data read size
metricSpecifications.name: VolumeCoolTierDataReadSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Data tiered out using PUT per volume
metricSpecifications.displayName: Volume cool tier data write size
metricSpecifications.name: VolumeCoolTierDataWriteSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The amount of time in seconds it took for the last transfer to complete.
metricSpecifications.name: XregionReplicationLastTransferDuration

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The total number of bytes transferred as part of the last transfer.
metricSpecifications.name: XregionReplicationLastTransferSize

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Condition of the relationship, 1 or 0.
metricSpecifications.name: XregionReplicationHealthy

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The amount of time in seconds by which the data on the mirror lags behind the source.
metricSpecifications.name: XregionReplicationLagTime

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Cumulative bytes transferred for the relationship.
metricSpecifications.name: XregionReplicationTotalTransferBytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total amount of data transferred for the current transfer operation.
metricSpecifications.name: XregionReplicationRelationshipProgress

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Whether the status of the Volume Replication is 'transferring'.
metricSpecifications.name: XregionReplicationRelationshipTransferring

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total bytes backed up for this Volume.
metricSpecifications.name: CbsVolumeLogicalBackupBytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Is backup enabled for the volume? 1 if yes, 0 if no.
metricSpecifications.name: CbsVolumeProtected

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Is the backup policy suspended for the volume? 0 if yes, 1 if no.
metricSpecifications.name: CbsVolumeBackupActive

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total bytes transferred for last backup or restore operation.
metricSpecifications.name: CbsVolumeOperationTransferredBytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Did the last volume backup or restore operation complete successfully? 1 if yes, 0 if no.
metricSpecifications.name: CbsVolumeOperationComplete

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total bytes transferred for last backup operation.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Volume Backup Operation Last Transferred Bytes
metricSpecifications.name: CbsVolumeOperationBackupTransferredBytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Total bytes transferred for last backup restore operation.
metricSpecifications.displayName: Volume Backup Restore Operation Last Transferred Bytes
metricSpecifications.name: CbsVolumeOperationRestoreTransferredBytes

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: The percentage of the volume consumed including snapshots.
metricSpecifications.name: VolumeConsumedSizePercentage

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Other throughput (that is not read or write) in bytes per second
metricSpecifications.name: OtherThroughput

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Read throughput in bytes per second
metricSpecifications.name: ReadThroughput

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Sum of all throughput in bytes per second
metricSpecifications.name: TotalThroughput

metricSpecifications.displayDescription: Write throughput in bytes per second
metricSpecifications.name: WriteThroughput
